coreAttributes.name: snowflake necklace
coreAttributes.description: A necklace consisting of a thin chain with a snowflake-shaped pendant threaded onto it. As an alternative to being worn around the neck, it would be possible to wrap the chain around your wrist.

replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] firmly [npc.verb(grab)] [npc2.name], before fastening the snowflake necklace around [npc2.her] neck.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc.her] snowflake necklace, before taking it off from around [npc.her] neck.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc2.namePos] snowflake necklace, before taking it off from around [npc2.her] neck.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc2.namePos] snowflake necklace, before yanking it off from around [npc2.her] neck.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wrap)] [npc.her] snowflake necklace around [npc.her] wrist and then [npc.verb(fasten)] it in place.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wrap)] the snowflake necklace around [npc2.namePos] wrist and then [npc.verb(fasten)] it in place.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(wrap)] the snowflake necklace around [npc2.namePos] wrist and then tightly [npc.verb(fasten)] it in place.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc.her] snowflake necklace, before unwrapping it from around [npc.her] wrist.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc2.namePos] snowflake necklace, before unwrapping it from around [npc2.her] wrist.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc2.namePos] snowflake necklace, before snatching it off [npc2.her] wrist.
